items.value: Oh hey, you're awake! (smaller text) [Loading Human Flattery program] I got bored of being out here alone and you meat sacks are oh so interesting. How are you? Great thank you.
I woke you because something incredible has happened. It's been 10 years since the incident and finally we have ventured upon something... breath taking! No... Breath MAKING!
I thawed you from (color change) [CONDITION: Meat Popsicle] because I have found a way to keep you alive and unfortunately, I need your help.
These blue/white chunks have started showing up. First it was one or two a day. now we're hitting 100s a day! I have thawed and analyzed them to be water.
You'll notice your oxygen is running low. I can extract oxygen from the chunks! I don't know where these chunks are coming from but, while your'e awake, you can fix my solar panel.
I'm boring you, aren't I? Point is: jump off and grab blue ice chunks. My thermal processor converts them to oxygen. Don't die!
Excellent! You're not completely hopeless. Keep collecting ice!
Two down! One more ice chunk and you'll understand the concept.
Well done! You've grasped the basics. Now we need something more sustainable than manually collecting space ice.
60 seconds left! Those ice chunks aren't going to collect themselves!
Well, that was predictable. You're dead. Try again?
Tiny ice chunk processed! +10 seconds. Better than nothing, I suppose.
Ice chunk processed! +30 seconds of not dying.
Massive ice chunk! +60 seconds of sweet, sweet oxygen!
